languages.text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Создает перегрузку на пустотных {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}щитах{/g} противника, перераспределяя их самой слабой стороной к {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагману{/g}. Если у противника есть голополе, число его зарядов сокращается. Пульсация может негативно влиять и на другие технологии ксеносов.
<indent=5%>Восстановление: случайное, <u>(от 1 до 3)</u> раундов.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Overloads voidshields to disrupt the enemy's defence. If the enemy has voidshields, they are removed to the opposite side from where the hit was. If the enemy has a Holo-field, it loses several charges.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: 1–3 rounds at random.</indent>

Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Создает перегрузку на пустотных щитах, чтобы ослабить защиту противника. Если у противника есть пустотные щиты, защита перестает действовать с поражаемой стороны и перераспределяется на три других сектора щита. Если у противника есть голополе, число его зарядов сокращается.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Восстановление{/g}: случайное, 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.</indent>

Создает перегрузку на пустотных щитах, чтобы ослабить защиту противника. Если у противника есть пустотные щиты, защита перестает действовать с поражаемой стороны и перераспределяется на три других сектора щита. Если у противника есть голополе, число его зарядов сокращается.
<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Восстановление{/g}: случайное, 1–3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Überlädt die {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g} des Gegners und verteilt sie um, wobei die schwächste Seite auf das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} gerichtet ist. Hat der Feind einen Holoschild, verliert dieser mehrere Ladungen. Der Impuls kann auch andere Xenos-Technologie negativ beeinflussen.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(1 bis 3)</u> Runden (zufällig).</indent>
languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Überlädt die {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}Schilde{/g} des Gegners und verteilt sie um, wobei die schwächste Seite auf das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} gerichtet ist. Hat der Feind einen Holoschild, verliert dieser mehrere Ladungen. Der Impuls kann auch andere Xenos-Technologie negativ beeinflussen.
<indent=5%>Abklingzeit: <u>(1 bis 3)</u> Runden (zufällig).</indent>

languages.text:
Surcharge les {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} de l'ennemi pour affaiblir au maximum ceux qui font face au {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}. Si l'ennemi dispose d'un holo-champ, il perd plusieurs de ses charges. L'impulsion peut également compromettre le fonctionnement d'autres technologies xénos.
<indent=5%>Temps de recharge : <u>de 1 à 3</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>
languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Surcharge les {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} de l'ennemi pour affaiblir au maximum ceux qui font face au {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}. Si l'ennemi dispose d'un holo-champ, il perd plusieurs de ses charges. L'impulsion peut également compromettre le fonctionnement d'autres technologies xénos.
<indent=5%>Temps de recharge : <u>de 1 à 3</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>

Surcharge les {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}boucliers{/g} de l'ennemi pour affaiblir au maximum ceux qui font face au {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}. Si l'ennemi dispose d'un holo-champ, il perd plusieurs de ses charges. L'impulsion peut également compromettre le fonctionnement d'autres technologies xénos.
<indent=5%>Délai de récupération : <u>de 1 à 3</u> rounds (aléatoire).</indent>

languages.text:
令敌舰{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}超载，同时令敌舰护盾最脆弱的一侧转向旗舰。如果{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}敌舰{/g}拥有全息投影，则会损失几层投影层数。此外，脉冲还会对其他异形技术造物产生负面影响。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
令敌舰{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}护盾{/g}超载，同时令敌舰护盾最脆弱的一侧转向旗舰。如果{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}敌舰{/g}拥有全息投影，则会损失几层投影层数。此外，脉冲还会对其他异形技术造物产生负面影响。
<indent=5%>冷却时间：随机<u>一到三轮</u>。</indent>

languages.text:
Sobrecarga los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} del enemigo, redistribuyéndolos y dejando el lado más débil orientado hacia la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g}. Si el enemigo tiene un campo holográfico, pierde varias cargas. El pulso también tiene efectos negativos para otras tecnologías xenos.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Sobrecarga los {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}escudos{/g} del enemigo, redistribuyéndolos y dejando el lado más débil orientado hacia la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g}. Si el enemigo tiene un campo holográfico, pierde varias cargas. El pulso también tiene efectos negativos para otras tecnologías xenos.
<indent=5%>Tiempo de recuperación: <u>(de 1 a 3)</u> asaltos aleatoriamente.</indent>

languages.text:
敵の{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}をオーバーロードして再分配し、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の側を最も脆弱にする。敵がホロフィールドを持っている場合、チャージを数回失う。このパルスは異種族テクノロジーにも悪影響を与えることがある。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>（1～3）</u> ラウンド。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Overloads the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}shields{/g}, redistributing them, with the weakest side facing the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}. If the enemy has a holo-field, it loses several of its charges. The pulse can also negatively impact other xenos technology.
<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
敵の{g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}シールド{/g}をオーバーロードして再分配し、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の側を最も脆弱にする。敵がホロフィールドを持っている場合、チャージを数回失う。このパルスは異種族テクノロジーにも悪影響を与えることがある。
<indent=5%>クールダウン：ランダムで<u>（1～3）</u> ラウンド。</indent>

languages.text:
Düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:VoidshipShieldsGlossary}kalkanlarını{/g} fazla yükleyerek en zayıf kısmı {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak gemisinin{/g} olduğu tarafa bakacak şekilde yeniden dağıtır. Düşmanın holo-alanı varsa birkaç şarjını kaybeder. Dalgalanma ayrıca diğer zeno teknolojilerini de olumsuz etkiler.
<indent=5%>Dolum Süresi: Rastgele <u>(1 ila 3)</u> raunt.</indent>

<indent=5%>Cooldown: <u>(from 1 to 3)</u> rounds at random.</indent>
